com.ibm.watson.developer_cloud.android.library.audio

Class MicrophoneInputStream

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.InputStream
      • com.ibm.watson.developer_cloud.android.library.audio.MicrophoneInputStream
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public final class MicrophoneInputStream
extends java.io.InputStream
    Captures raw audio data from the microphone and exposes it via an InputStream. Make sure close() gets called in order to free its resources appropriately.

      • consume

        public void consume(byte[] data,
                    double amplitude,
                    double volume)
        Data that has been recorded in the most recent sample and is ready for consumption.
        Parameters:
        data - Buffer of audio data in raw form.
        amplitude - Amplitude from sample.
        volume - Volume from sample.

      • setOnAmplitudeListener

        public void setOnAmplitudeListener(AmplitudeListener listener)
        Receive amplitude (and volume) data per sample from the MicrophoneInputStream.
        Parameters:
        listener - Notified per sample with amplitude and volume data.

      • getContentType

        public java.lang.String getContentType()
        Get the audio format from the MicrophoneInputStream
        Returns:
        audio/l16;rate=16000
